segments.text: May I see your airplane ticket , passport and health certificate please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Will you please put your luggage on the scale ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to check these three pieces and I'll carry this overnight bag by myself .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sir , your bags are 30 pounds over weight . You are allowed only 45 pounds of baggage .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , then , how much do I owe you ?
segments.speaker: S2
